summary: Command‑line tool that runs the light‑emission simulation chain for CTA calibration devices. It configures the telescope, site, illuminator and light‑source settings (variable distance or layout, LED or laser), invokes the CORSIKA/Simtel simulators, processes the output and can generate PDF plots of the results.
business_intent: Generate realistic calibration data for Cherenkov telescopes, enabling performance studies, calibration strategy development and verification of light‑source devices.
